attributes.action: MAKE SURE THAT A BORING X FACTOR WINNER IS NOT NUMBER ONE BUT JOHN AND EDWARD ARE NUMBER ONE  THIS X MAS !!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THIS IS A FACT

SIMON COWEL  WILL  GIVE RECORD CONTRACTS NO MATTER HOW FAR  THEY  GET IN THIS YEARS X FACTOR...............


DANYL 
STACEY
JOE
LUCY


WE THE UNDERSIGNED ARE  SICK TO THE DEATH OF   PRESUMPSIOUS   X FACTOR  XMAS NUMBER 1'S   


THIS  PETITION IS TO GIVE  JOHN AND EDWARD  RESPECT  AND TO LET THEM   FOR THIS YEARS  XMAS NUMBER 1  COVER  WIZZARDS   CLASSIC  X MAS SINGLE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

COME ON GORDAN  VOTE FOR  JOHN AND EDWARD !!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
